sentences.sContent: Sgt. Norwood complained that the article defamed him.
sentences.sCn: 诺维德中士抱怨这篇文章诽谤他。

remMethod.val: de(变坏) + fame(名声) → 使名声变坏 → 诽谤

words.tran: 诽谤的；中伤的；破坏名誉的

trans.tranOther: to write or say bad or untrue things about someone or something, so that people will have a bad opinion of them
